greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(8*k))/(1 + x^k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Vaclav Kotesovec, A method of finding the asymptotics of q-series based on the convolution of generating functions, arXiv:1509.08708 [math.CO], Sep 30 2015, p. 14.
mathematica: nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(8*k))/(1 + x^k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 30 2015
